20110114150549.000|20110114150551.000|CC1|>> HEY, MEREDITH.               
20110114150551.000|20110114150552.000|CC1|>> HARD TO BELIEVE JUST SIX DAYS
20110114150552.000|20110114150554.000|CC1|AGO CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS WAS  
20110114150554.000|20110114150555.000|CC1|SHOT IN THE HEAD, AND HAD THAT  
20110114150555.000|20110114150557.000|CC1|BULLET PENETRATED HER BRAIN IN  
20110114150557.000|20110114150558.000|CC1|JUST A SLIGHTLY DIFFERENT       
20110114150558.000|20110114150600.000|CC1|DIRECTION, SHE WOULD PROBABLY BE
20110114150600.000|20110114150600.000|CC1|DEAD.                           
20110114150600.000|20110114150601.000|CC1|BUT SINCE THEN, SHE HAS PUT UP  
20110114150601.000|20110114150603.000|CC1|TWO FINGERS, SHE'S MOVED HER    
20110114150603.000|20110114150605.000|CC1|ARMS AND HER LEGS, SHE'S OPENED 
20110114150605.000|20110114150605.000|CC1|HER EYES.                       
20110114150605.000|20110114150607.000|CC1|DOCTORS SAY THEY SEEM NOW TO BE 
20110114150607.000|20110114150608.000|CC1|TRACKING.

20110114150609.000|20110114150611.000|CC1|MIRACULOUS, GIVEN SOMEONE IN HER
20110114150611.000|20110114150611.000|CC1|CONDITION?                      
20110114150611.000|20110114150613.000|CC1|>> IT'S A COMBINATION OF        
20110114150613.000|20110114150615.000|CC1|MIRACULOUS, LUCKY THAT THE      
20110114150615.000|20110114150618.000|CC1|TRAJECTORY OF THE BULLET IS WHAT
20110114150618.000|20110114150619.000|CC1|IT WAS, AND I THINK, WE HAVE TO 
20110114150619.000|20110114150620.000|CC1|GIVE A LOT OF CREDIT TO THIS    
20110114150620.000|20110114150622.000|CC1|STELLAR MEDICAL CREW.           
20110114150622.000|20110114150623.000|CC1|THEY HAD HER FROM A BATTLEFIELD,
20110114150623.000|20110114150625.000|CC1|THROUGH THE ICU, INTO THE O.R., 
20110114150625.000|20110114150628.000|CC1|AND BACK INTO THE ICU WITHIN 38 
20110114150628.000|20110114150629.000|CC1|MINUTES.                        
20110114150629.000|20110114150630.000|CC1|THEY TREATED THIS LIKE IT WAS A 
20110114150630.000|20110114150632.000|CC1|TYPICAL WAR ZONE.               
20110114150632.000|20110114150633.000|CC1|THE PHYSICIANS AND EVERYONE ON  
20110114150633.000|20110114150635.000|CC1|THE FACULTY THERE, IT'S MADE A  
20110114150635.000|20110114150636.000|CC1|HUGE DIFFERENCE IN HER RECOVERY.
20110114150636.000|20110114150638.000|CC1|WHAT THEY SAID YESTERDAY WITH   
20110114150638.000|20110114150640.000|CC1|HER ABILITY NOW TO FOLLOW       
20110114150640.000|20110114150641.000|CC1|COMMANDS, JUST SIMPLE COMMANDS, 
20110114150641.000|20110114150643.000|CC1|BUT IT SHOWS THAT THINGS ARE    
20110114150643.000|20110114150644.000|CC1|FIRING IN HER BRAIN AND         
20110114150644.000|20110114150645.000|CC1|CONNECTIONS ARE BEING MADE.     
20110114150645.000|20110114150646.000|CC1|AND THE FACT THAT SHE CAN NOW   
20110114150646.000|20110114150649.000|CC1|TRACK A LITTLE BIT WITH HER EYES
20110114150649.000|20110114150650.000|CC1|MEANS THAT SHE'S COGNIZANT OF   
20110114150650.000|20110114150652.000|CC1|SOME THINGS AROUND HER.         
20110114150652.000|20110114150655.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, WHEN SHE OPENED HER
20110114150655.000|20110114150655.000|CC1|EYES FOR THE FIRST TIME, SHE WAS
20110114150655.000|20110114150657.000|CC1|SURROUNDED BY SOME OF HER FEMALE
20110114150657.000|20110114150658.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES, SENATOR GILLIBRAND  
20110114150658.000|20110114150701.000|CC1|SPOKE SO ELOQUENTLY ABOUT THAT. 
20110114150701.000|20110114150703.000|CC1|AND ONE OF THE REPRESENTATIVES, 
20110114150703.000|20110114150704.000|CC1|DEBBIE WASSERMAN SCHULTZ WAS IN 
20110114150704.000|20110114150705.000|CC1|THE HOSPITAL ROOM, AND SHE SAYS,
20110114150705.000|20110114150708.000|CC1|IT SHOWS YOU WHAT A LITTLE GIRL 
20110114150708.000|20110114150709.000|CC1|POWER CAN DO.                   
20110114150709.000|20110114150710.000|CC1|SHE WAS KIND OF JOKING, BUT     
20110114150710.000|20110114150711.000|CC1|THERE'S MERIT IN THOSE WORDS.   
20110114150711.000|20110114150712.000|CC1|>> I THINK SHE'S JOKING, BUT WE 
20110114150712.000|20110114150713.000|CC1|KNOW IT'S TRUE.                 
20110114150713.000|20110114150715.000|CC1|WHEN PEOPLE ARE SITTING VIGIL   
20110114150715.000|20110114150716.000|CC1|AND HER HUSBAND IS THERE AND THE
20110114150716.000|20110114150718.000|CC1|TELEVISION IS ON, YOU           
20110114150718.000|20110114150720.000|CC1|RECOGNIZE -- PATIENTS WILL TELL 
20110114150720.000|20110114150723.000|CC1|YOU AFTERWARDS -- THAT THEY ARE 
20110114150723.000|20110114150723.000|CC1|SURROUNDED.                     
20110114150723.000|20110114150724.000|CC1|BUT THEN THERE'S A NEW VOICE    
20110114150724.000|20110114150725.000|CC1|THAT'S FAMILIAR AND IT MAKES    
20110114150725.000|20110114150727.000|CC1|YOUR BRAIN WORK A LITTLE HARDER.
20110114150727.000|20110114150729.000|CC1|AND IF IT'S A GIRLFRIEND, YEAH, 
20110114150729.000|20110114150731.000|CC1|THERE ARE CHEMICAL CHANGES,     
20110114150731.000|20110114150733.000|CC1|THERE ARE EMOTIONAL CHANGES.    
20110114150733.000|20110114150734.000|CC1|SO IT'S WHAT I WOULD CALL       
20110114150734.000|20110114150735.000|CC1|THOUGHT SCIENCE.                
20110114150735.000|20110114150737.000|CC1|THERE IS SOMETHING TO IT.
